item.title: About
item.description: Hi, I’m Junjie Oscar Yin I am excessively interested in [TODO]. Below is a list of things that I am constantly thinking about/workding toward: TODO. Making Training & Deployment of LLMs More Accessible. I am excited by novel methods for efficient pre-training, post-training, and inference. In my undergraduate years at Johns Hopkins and Oxford, I am forunate to be advised by Alan Yuille. Recent Updates Below you will find the most recent updates:
